metadata.title: CVE-2021-23413 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: This affects the package jszip before 3.7.0. Crafting a new zip file withfilenames set to Object prototype values (e.g __proto__, toString, etc)results in a returned object with a modified prototype instance.

criterions.comment: node-jszip package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
